content: * 1 scblo in each stitch repeat from * around join last stitch and first stitch with a slip_stitch finishing cut yarn leaving an 8 20 5 cm tail thread yarn needle with tail and weave in ending yarn tail on inside of hat repeat with beginning yarn tail and trim off any excess yarn © 2017 pixiebell elfinwear all rights reserved this original design pattern is property of pixiebell elfinwear the written pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images in part or in whole if the finished product is to be sold please link back to my shop original design by diane serviss of pixiebell https //www etsy com/shop/pixiebell shop and social media links etsy http //pixiebell etsy com ravelry - http //www ravelry com/designers/diane-serviss craftsy - http //www craftsy com/user/483463/pattern-store facebook http //www facebook com/elfinwear twitter http //twitter com/elfinwear tumblr http //pixiebell tumblr com pinterest http //pinterest com/elfinwear
